2.title: Part Two

5.title: My Christmas Wish: Part Two
5.plot: Laying in her bed filled with anxiety and fear, RayVeness sleeps with nightmares filling her head. She sees images of her and step daughter Jenna Reid beside the fire, opening Christmas gifts. But her dreams warp from a beautiful moment to utter dismay.
